0.2.name: wordpress/wp-broken-images
0.2.description: This plugin is designed to “fight” the broken images on your WordPress powered site. It works by inserting a JavaScript snippet in the output HTML code of your pages, which attaches itself to the onError=".." events of the images, so if an image fails to load, this JS snippet is fired. You can customize what actions you want to perform on the broken images: hide them, style-them, replace them, etc - all this from the WordPress admin panel.
